Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ine ndili kulumbira pali Mzinda uwu
Ndipo iwe uli ndi ufulu mu Mzinda uwu
Ndi pali wobereka ndi chimene adabereka
Ndithudi Ife tidamulenga munthu m’mavuto
Kodi amaganiza kuti palibe wina aliyense amene ali ndi mphamvu pa iye
Iye amanena monyada kuti: “Ine Al-Shams	653 ndaononga chuma chambiri.”
Kodi iye amaganiza kuti palibe wina amene ali kumuona
Kodi Ife sitidamupatse maso awiri
Ndi lirime ndi milomo iwiri
Ndi kumulangiza iye njira ziwiri
Koma sayerekeza kutsata njira yozyolika
Kodi chidzakuuza ndi chiani za njira yozyolika
Ndi kumasula kapolo
Kapena kupereka chakudya nthawi ya njala
Kwa wamasiye amene ndi wachinansi
Kapena munthu wosauka, wofuna chithandizo
Ndipo iye anakhala mmodzi wa anthu amene akhulupirira, ndipo analangizana wina ndi mzake kupilira, kumva chisoni ndi kuonetsa chifundo
Iwo ndiwo amene adzakhala kudzanja lamanja
Koma iwo amene anakana chivumbulutso chathu, adzaima ku dzanja lamanzere
Ndipo moto wa ku Gahena udzawakuta iwo
Pali dzuwa ndi kuwala kwake
Ndi pali mwezi umene umatuluka dzuwa litalowa
Ndi masana pamene kumayera
Ndi pali usiku umene umabisa
Ndi pali Kumwamba ndi Iye amene adakulenga
Ndi pali dziko lapansi ndi Iye amene analitambasula
Ndi pali mzimu ndi Iye amene adaulenga
Ndi kumupatsa iye nzeru zodziwa choipa ndi chabwino
Ndithudi wopambana ndi amene amadziyeretsa
Ndipo wolephera ndiye amene wadzidetsa
Anthu a Thamoud adakana Mtumwi wawo poukiramoyerekedwa
Pamenemunthuolakwakwambiri adayambitsa chipolowe
Ndipo Mthenga wa Mulungu anati kwa iwo: “Samalirani ngamira ya ikazi ya Mulungu ndi tsiku lake lomwa madzi!”
Iwo sadakhulupirire ayi ndipo ngamirayo adaipha. Motero Ambuye wawo adawaononga chifukwa cha machimo awo ndipo adafafaniza onse mosasankha
Iye sadaope chotsatira chake
Paliusikupamenemdimaumayamba
Ndimasanapamene kumayera
Ndi pali Iye amene adalenga chachimuna ndi chachikazi
Ndithudi zochita zanu zonse zili ndi mapeto osiyana
Akakhala iye amene amapereka chaulere ndipo amamuopa Mulungu
Ndipo amakhulupirira pochita zinthu zabwino
Ife tidzamusalazira njira yake ya ku chipulumutso
Koma iye amene sapereka chaulere ndipo amaganiza kuti ndi woima payekha
Sakhulupirira ndipo sachita ntchito zabwino
Tidzamusalazira njira yake ya ku chionongeko
Kodi chuma chake chidzamuthandiza chiani pamene iye azidzazunzika
Ndithudi ndi udindo wathu kupereka chilangizo
Ndipo, ndithudi, zonse za m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndi za m’moyo uno ndi zathu
Motero ndakuchenjezani za moto wa lawilawi
Kulibe Al-Dhuha	655 munthu amene akapsye nawo kupatula munthu wochita zoipa
Amene amakana choonadi ndipo safuna kumvera chenjezo
Koma anthu onse olungama, adzatalikirana nawo
Amene amapereka chaulere chake poonjezera kudziyeretsa
Osati chifukwa chakuti afuna kupezako cholowa ayi
Kupatula ndi cholinga chopeza chisomo cha Ambuye wake, wapamwamba mwamba
Ndithudi iye adzasangalala
Pali usana
Ndi pali usiku pamene ulipo
Ambuye wako sadakutaye iwe ndiponso sakudana nawe ayi
Ndipo, ndithudi, moyo umene uli nkudza ndi wabwino kwa iwe kuposa moyo uno
Ndithudi Ambuye wako adzakupatsa, ndipo iwe chidzakukondweretsa
Kodi sadakupeze iwe uli wa masiye ndipo adakupatsa malo okhala
Kodi sadakupeze uli wosochera ndipo Iye adakutsogolera
Kodi sadakupeze iwe waumphawi ndipo adakulemeretsa
Motero iwe usapondereze pansi mwana wa masiye
Ndipo usapirikitse munthu wopempha
Koma lengeza chisomo cha a Ambuye wako
